h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Black Bear Guai
content: With your business concluded in Black Wind Mountain, you can enjoy the scene and tapestry that unfold after the battle, and then begin your journey into **Chapter 2: Yellow Sand, Desolate Dusk**.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Black_Wind_Cave_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Black Wind Cave Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Black Bear Guai'.
The content is as follows:
With your business concluded in Black Wind Mountain, you can enjoy the scene and tapestry that unfold after the battle, and then begin your journey into **Chapter 2: Yellow Sand, Desolate Dusk**.
